modmenu.descriptionTranslation.patpat: Simple Fabric mod for patting any mobs!
patpat.title: §lPatPat
patpat.command.list.remove.failed: Player[%s, %s] was not found in list
patpat.command.list.mode.success: List Mode has been changed from %s to %s
patpat.command.list.mode.failed: Failed to parse ListMode[whitelist, blacklist, disabled] from %s
patpat.modmenu.title: §lPatPat Client-side Configuration
patpat.modmenu.no_yacl_screen.message:
You need to install §6§lYet Another Config Lib [YACL]§f to open PatPat Client Configuration Screen

§a§lOpen §6§lYACL §a§lModrinth page?
patpat.modmenu.main.option.enable_mod.de: If enabled, you will see mob patting and other features, if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.sound.option.enable_sound: If enabled, you will hear the patting sounds, in disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.visual.option.hiding_nick: If enabled, entity's nickname will disappear when you or someone pats it, if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.visual.option.swing_hand_: If enabled, your hand in hud will moving, if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.visual.option.lowering_an: If enabled, pat animation will lowering, if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.visual.option.hand_offset: Transfer the hand along X axis relative to default pos.
Transfer the hand along Y axis relative to default pos.
Transfer the hand along Z axis relative to default pos.
patpat.modmenu.server.option.pat_me_enab: If enabled, other players will be able to pat you, if disabled, won't be able.
patpat.modmenu.server.option.bypass_serv: Enable Server Resource Pack Priority Bypassing
If enabled, server resource pack priority will bypassing, if disabled, won't.
